metadata.description: Specify your Power Automate environment region/cloud: Commercial, GCC, GCC High, or DoD.

inputs.name: TranscriptToolsArray
MultiturnPendingResult
inputs.value: @if(or(equals(variables('MultiturnResult'), 2), equals(variables('MultiturnResult'), 3), equals(variables('MultiturnResult'), 4)), false, if(equals(variables('MultiturnResult'), 5), true, false))

parameters.$filter:
_cat_copilottestrunid_value eq '@{triggerBody()['text_1']}'  
and statecode eq 0 
and cat_resultcode ne 4 
and cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 6
and _cat_parent_value eq '@{items('Apply_to_each:_Test_Result')?['cat_copilottestresultid']}'

_cat_copilottestrunid_value eq '@{triggerBody()['text_1']}'  
and statecode eq 0 
and cat_resultcode ne 2 and cat_resultcode ne 3 and cat_resultcode ne 4
and (cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 6 or cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 5) 
and _cat_parent_value eq null

Get_Flow_Endpoint.inputs: @if(equals(toLower(parameters('Power Automate Region (cat_PowerAutomateEndpoint)')), 'gcc'), 'https://make.gov.powerautomate.us/', if(equals(toLower(parameters('Power Automate Region (cat_PowerAutomateEndpoint)')), 'gcc(high)'), 'https://make.high.powerautomate.us/', if(equals(toLower(parameters('Power Automate Region (cat_PowerAutomateEndpoint)')), 'dod'), 'https://make.powerautomate.appsplatform.us/', 'https://make.powerautomate.com/')))

parameters.item/cat_errordetails:
@concat( body('Update_Copilot_Test_Run:_Running')?['cat_errordetails'], '
', 'Failed ', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )

@concat( triggerBody()['text_2'], '
', '', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )

runError.message: Agent Id is required for Plan Validation.

parameters.item/cat_errordetails:
@concat( outputs('Update_Copilot_Test_Run:_Running')?['body/cat_errordetails'], '
', '', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )
